item.title: Managed Hosting PBX Gets You Out Of The Telephone Business
item.description:
A lot of businesses find themselves managing their own phone systems simply because they need phones to operate, even though it’s not their core business. This has become the norm, but it doesn’t have to be this way anymore. Companies previously invested in extensive phone systems because the productivity gains from each employee having a direct line outweighed the costs. In the past, a single phone line sufficed, but with the information age, constant communication became essential, driving the need for dedicated telecom departments...
